quest.name: Chasing Shadows
journal: Galfrid needs an adventurer to investigate suspicious activity in the Twelveswood.

At the Bannock, you learn that Ixali activity has been steadily increasing since the appearance of an as-yet-unknown individual in the Twelveswood. Suspecting a connection, Galfrid bids you investigate Lifemend Stump to the northeast.
Arriving at Lifemend Stump, you are met with a baffling sight: a sword has been thrust into the stump, and an Ixal lies dead nearby.
The mystery does not end there. Who were those two strange characters, and what was the scene that unfolded inside your mind's eye? The sword may well be a clue...
You have removed the sword from Lifemend Stump. Take it back to the Bannock and show it to Galfrid.

It turns out that the Hyuran lass and Lalafellin lad you encountered are friends of Gridania. Named Yda and Papalymo, respectively, the pair are scholars who are assisting the Gods' Quiver and the Wood Wailers. That revelation aside, your efforts have helped shed some light on the Ixal's recent activities. Galfrid expresses his gratitude, and asks that you continue to labor in service of Gridania and her citizens.
objectives: Pull the sword from Lifemend Stump.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. By your tireless efforts, you have proven yourself a friend to Gridania. I believe you can be trusted with sensitive intelligence.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: I would assign you a mission of considerable import, yet the need for secrecy prevents me from disclosing its details until you have pledged your participation. I am authorized to tell you only that it concerns suspicious activity in the Twelveswood. Say that you will lend us your aid, and I shall proceed with the briefing.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Good. Time is of the essence, so listen well.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: You will by now have heard that a suspicious individual has been seen prowling the Twelveswood.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: And you may also be aware that Ixali activity has risen sharply in the region of late. What you may not know is that this increase coincided almost exactly with the first recorded sighting of the aforementioned individual.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Suspecting a connection, we tightened our surveillance in hopes of tracking down our unknown visitor. Alas, our quarry is proving to be exceedingly elusive─almost as if he knows our movements ahead of time.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: But where whole units have failed, a lone adventurer may yet succeed. Acting independently and covertly, you may be able to close in on our quarry unnoticed.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Fear and anxiety are beginning to take their toll upon the citizenry, Forename. For their sake, I ask that you aid us in this investigation.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: You have my gratitude. With your help, I am hopeful we will shed light upon this mystery.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Begin your search at Lifemend Stump. It is there that the majority of the sightings took place.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Be forewarned: my people cannot offer you support, lest our quarry catch scent of our presence and evade us yet again. Proceed with caution.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Chasing Shadows”?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are about to enter an instanced battle. Instanced battles only occur during certain quests and missions.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Take a moment to read the information displayed in the active help window before answering the call of duty.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Defeat the frenzied creatures!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Look! Someone's already here!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Oh dear. Is that a sword in the stump? Bad idea. Really bad idea...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: It takes a lot less than that to incite the greenwrath, you know. Why, the first time we came to the Twelveswood, we almost ended up as a treant's dinner just for crashing our airship in the wrong place. It was all Papalymo's fault, of course. Though he'd sooner swallow his staff than admit that he's wrong.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Is this our dark stranger?

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: (-Moogle-)No, no, not this one. Not even close, kupo!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Hm? You know herhim, Kuplo Kopp?

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: (-Kuplo Kopp-)Well, not exactly, but we did once share a carriage. Isn't that right?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Is this our dark stranger?

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text:
(-Moogle-)Of course not! SheHe's not a stranger at all!
At least I don't think shehe is...

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Ah, now that you mention it, there is something familiar about herhim...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Hey, you're right! This feels more like a reunion than a first meeting.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)So, um...when did we first meet again?

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: (-Moogle-)I...don't recall exactly. But I do remember herhim being a good person.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)How are the readings?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Same as the last. There is a disturbance here as well, and newly manifested at that.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Kuplo Kopp seems convinced of your innocence. But if this isn't your doing, whose is it?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Ever since the Calamity, the forest's been really sensitive.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)The slightest disruption to the aetheric flow...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)And this sort of thing happens!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)It seems we have little choice...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: <huff> <puff>

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: <huff> <puff>

dialogue.name: MOTHERCRYSTAL
dialogue.text: Hear... Feel... Think...

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Crystal bearer...

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: I am Hydaelyn. All made one.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: A Light there once was that shone throughout this realm...yet it hath since grown dim.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: And as it hath faltered, so hath Darkness risen up in its stead, presaging an end to Life.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: For the sake of all, I beseech thee: deliver us from this fate!

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: The power to banish the Darkness dwelleth in the Crystals of Light. Journey forth and lay claim to them.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: By thy deeds shall the Crystals reveal themselves to thee.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Only believe, for the Light liveth in thy heart.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Go now, my child, and shine thy Light on all creation.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)You fainted. A surfeit of aether, no doubt.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Hm? And what have we here?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Our culprit, it would seem. An Ixal. And no ordinary Ixal, either─a chieftain.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)That they would venture this deep into enemy territory... The beastmen may indeed be acting under orders.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: This is Papalymo. We've found the culprit─it was an Ixali chieftain. Yes, we'll seek Brother E-Sumi-Yan's cooperation in the matter. Yda? Oh, loud, tactless─much the same as always.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)How are we feeling, then? Better? Good!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Giant crystals? Can't say I've seen any... Are you sure you're feeling better?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)...Understood. Over and out.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Kuplo Kopp. Please bear word of these developments to Brother E–Sumi–Yan. We shall soon return to give a full report.

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: (-Kuplo Kopp-)Understood! Over and out, kupo!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Here is where we part ways. Till next time, take care!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)I think that sword might be a clue! You should definitely pull it out and take it back to the Bannock!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)You don't suppose that adventurer could see Kuplo Kopp, do you!?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)And this occurs to you NOW!?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Yes. It seemed that way. Time will tell...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: (-Animated Pugilist-)Well, time will have to, because you won't! You never tell me what's really going on! Unless...you don't know what's going on either!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: (-Short-tempered Thaumaturge-)Bah! You'd like that, wouldn't you!?

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Forename! It is good to see you back!

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: One of our patrols sent word that you had been spotted doing battle with enraged treants. I am relieved to find you none the worse for the experience.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: But tell me, what were you able to discover at Lifemend Stump?

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: A sword in the stump, and a dead Ixal? Hmmm...

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: I can say with absolute certainty that this blade is of Ixali origin. It is of a kind used exclusively in the beastmen's rituals.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: The Ixal rarely set foot in the Central Shroud, so tight is our guard over the area. What purpose could have driven them to take such a risk? I fear something is afoot...

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: What's that? A dubious couple sporting peculiar spectacles? Hah hah hah!

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: So you have finally been acquainted with Yda and Papalymo! Lay your suspicions to rest─Gridania counts them among her staunchest allies. Both are scholars hailing from a distant land, and have been with us since before the Calamity.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Their garb may appear outlandish, and their exchanges baffling, but never once have they given us cause to doubt them.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Indeed, they often assist the Gods' Quiver and the Wood Wailers in their work─much as I hope you will in the days to come, Forename.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: Although our unknown visitor eludes us still, owing to your efforts, we have acquired important intelligence on the Ixali threat. You have my gratitude.

dialogue.name: GALFRID
dialogue.text: We are fortunate indeed to have a capable adventurer such as you aiding us. I pray you will continue to serve the people of Gridania in whatever capacity you are able.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Do you want to get eaten!? Hit them harder!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: If you value your life, stay close!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Well done! We're almost there!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Are you all right!?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: I'm trying, I'm trying!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: There's more! Be careful!
